info.name: Phoenix
info.summary: Next generation user interface for ownCloud
info.description:
Next generation user interface for ownCloud based on vue.js and UiKit. This is an early release with known limitations and missing features.
Please report and findings in https://talk.owncloud.com/channel/phoenix
info.author: Felix Heidecke, Oshan Mudannayake, Thomas Müller, Lukas Hirt, Julian Müller
